title: marevareno hariya
sahitya:
maravereno hariya marevare mUru lOkada doreyA


caraNam 1    madagaja hari endu odaralu odagidAkSaNa bandu udadi nakrana kondu salahida sadbhaktara 
bandu mrdula prahlAdana bedarisida surana udarava bagidantha adbhuta rUpana
    caraNam 2    nAri tanna kareda mAtradi sIreya maLagaredA ghOra shApadi biddA strIyaLuddhAra 
dayadi mADadAjAra ajAmiLa nArAyaNanena pArugANisidapAra mahimanA
    caraNam 3    ondu bArige shrIsha entare banda durita nAshA bendavu bhavapAsha avari godigillavo 
klEshA indire ramaNa shrI purandara viTTalana endendige nenevaro andige danyaru
